article.headline: Massachusetts 70, Davidson 67
article.story: AMHERST, Mass. (AP) -- Rashaun Freeman scored 14 points and Massachusetts beat Davidson 70-67 on Sunday. Art Bowers added 13 points for the Minutemen (4-3), while Jeff Viggiano and Chris Chadwick each had 12. Jason Morton had 18 points for the Wildcats (5-5) and Ian Johnson added 17. A short jumper by Johnson and a 3-pointer by Morton gave Davidson its only lead of the second half, 56-55 with 6:10 to play. Bowers hit a 3 to give UMass, which led by as many as nine points in the second half, the lead for good. A tip-in by Jeff Salovski at the buzzer gave the Minutemen a 34-30 halftime lead.
